text: Leonardo Del Vecchio (22 May 1935 - 27 June 2022) was an Italian billionaire businessman. He was the founder and chairman of Luxottica, the world's largest producer and retailer of glasses and lenses. In January 2020, Del Vecchio had a net worth of $25.8 billion, which made him the richest man in Italy, and the 50th richest in the world.
